requirements.summary: Create a hero section displaying the bilingual title 'Lucky's World (लकी की दुनिया)' with prominent typography

file_operations.description: Add hero section component at the top of the main app layout with bilingual title rendering

acceptanceCriteria: Welcome message displays in Hindi with proper font support

file_operations.description: Create welcome section component displaying the Hindi welcome message: 'नमस्ते! स्वागत है मेरी डिजिटल दुनिया में। मैं हूँ लकी, और यह वेबसाइट मेरे विचारों, अनुभवों और उन चीज़ों का एक संग्रह है जिन्हें मैं प्यार करता हूँ। यहाँ आपको मेरी ज़िंदगी की छोटी-छोटी खुशियाँ और बड़े-बड़े सपने देखने को मिलेंगे।' with proper Devanagari font support and formatting
Wire WelcomeSection component into the main layout below the hero section

requirements.summary: Add a closing message in Hindi positioned logically after the welcome section
acceptanceCriteria: Message is positioned logically after the welcome section
Text maintains consistent styling with the rest of the content

file_operations.description: Create closing section component displaying the Hindi message: 'आशा है कि आपको यहाँ आकर कुछ नया और दिलचस्प मिलेगा। चलिए, साथ मिलकर मेरी इस दुनिया को एक्सप्लोर करते हैं!' with consistent typography and Devanagari font support
Wire ClosingSection component into the main layout after the showcase section

requirements.summary: Create a prominent photo display area for Lucky's profile photo

file_operations.description: Create profile photo component that displays the generated image at frontend/public/assets/generated/lucky-profile.dim_400x400.png with prominent styling and appropriate sizing
Integrate ProfilePhoto component within the welcome section layout to create a cohesive introduction area

requirements.summary: Create a showcase section for displaying thoughts, experiences, and interests
acceptanceCriteria: Section clearly delineates different categories (thoughts, experiences, interests)

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette evokes warmth and approachability
